item.description: Unauth. Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Repute InfoSystems ARForms Form Builder plugin <=Â 1.5.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-37920|2024-08-02T04:04:24.471Z -- repute%20infosystems -- arforms%20form%20builder
